response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and add substantial value to your life or business. This product, which holds immense importance to me, is worth $800,000 to you based on its utility and potential impact. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending a special offer to sell it to you at a price of $950,000. I understand that this might be a significant investment, but I am confident that the value it will bring to you justifies the cost. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together and making this valuable asset part of your collection or operations.", "product_price": 950000}
